nodes.text: The C-3 passenger liner was a passenger vessel in use during the Galactic Civil War.

They were very luxurious craft and were often spotted in park near space facilities. A fairly common sight on the spacelanes, even Emperor Palpatine employed a C-3 liner, the Excalibur, as a personal transport. It was ambushed in 3 ABY by traitorous Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin. Following the Battle of Artorias the New Republic used several C-3s to evacuate civilians from Artorias.
The C-3 passenger liner was created for the 1994 LucasArts video game Star Wars: TIE Fighter.
